sentences.sContent: ‘My leg!’ he gasped. ‘I think it’s broken!’
sentences.sCn: “我的腿！”他倒抽一口气喊道，“我觉得腿断了！”

synos.tran: 气喘吁吁地说；喘着气说话

phrases.pCn: 呼吸十分困难， 上气不接下气

remMethod.val: gas(气体， 煤气) ＋ p → 煤气中毒后喘不过气 → 喘气

trans.tranOther: to breathe in suddenly in a way that can be heard, especially because you are surprised or in pain
when you take in a breath suddenly in a way that can be heard, especially because you are surprised or in pain
